meanings: (쓰레기 등을) throw away, throw out, dump, (informal) junk
(포기하다, 떠나다) desert, leave, abandon, (literary) forsake, give up

vlive.korean: 저걸 다 말해버린다고? Can you say that all now? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [GOING SEVENTEEN 2020] EP.3 돈't Lie #1 (Don't Lie #1)
vlive.english: Can you say that all now?

vlive.korean: 많이 속상해 했어요 - 그거까지 말해버린다고? He was so upset. - You are telling them all? 듣기 View video VICTON : 레몬2🐥🐶🍋
vlive.english: He was so upset. - You are telling them all?

vlive.korean: V LIVE 다시듣기를 쩌렁쩌렁 틀어버린다고요? You are going to turn on the replay really loudly? 듣기 View video Park Bo Young : 잠깐
vlive.english: You are going to turn on the replay really loudly?

vlive.korean: 이렇게 돼버린다고? Are you trying this to him? 듣기 View video X1 : X1 BUS 자리정하기♡
vlive.english: Are you trying this to him?

vlive.korean: 뭘 버려? 보컬 레슨을 버린다고? What did you throw away? You threw away the vocal lesson? 듣기 View video B1A4 : 오늘하루도 잘 보내고 계신가요~??
vlive.english: What did you throw away? You threw away the vocal lesson?

examples.korean: If they eat seaweed, success might 'slip' away. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 미역을 먹으면, 성공이 미끄러져버린다고 생각한다. Neungyule
examples.english: If they eat seaweed, success might 'slip' away. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The wife of Prime Minister Tony Bair admits to upsetting the Monopoly board if she is losing. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 토니 블레어 영국 총리의 부인은 모노폴리게임을 할 때, 지고 있으면 게임판을 뒤집어 엎어버린다고 하는군요. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The wife of Prime Minister Tony Bair admits to upsetting the Monopoly board if she is losing. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Last night someone called me that he would blow up my house. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 어제밤에 어떤 사람이 전화해서 내집을 푹파시켜버린다고 했다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Last night someone called me that he would blow up my house. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: One farmer says that the bugs get one taste of Tabasco, jump three feet in the air, and run the other way. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 한 농부에 따르면, 벌레들이 타바스코 맛을 한 번 보게 되면, 놀라서 공중으로 3피트(92센티미터)나 뛰어 올랐다가 달아나버린다고 합니다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: One farmer says that the bugs get one taste of Tabasco, jump three feet in the air, and run the other way. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: In the past, scientists believed the brain contained a fixed number of neurons, and as we got older, we used up our available cells. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 과거에, 과학자들은 뇌가 어떤 일정 수의 신경을 가지고 있는데 나이가 들면서 우리가 사용 가능한 세포들을 다 써버린다고 믿고 있었습니다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: In the past, scientists believed the brain contained a fixed number of neurons, and as we got older, we used up our available cells. Add to Wordbook
